SEARCH
Package main.java.mvc.model.AI

Class MediumAi

java.lang.Object
main.java.mvc.model.AI.MediumAi
All Implemented Interfaces:
AiStrategy
public class MediumAi extends Object implements AiStrategy
Represents a medium difficulty AI for a battleship game. This AI strategy is a balance between random moves and targeting potential ship locations after a successful hit.

  • Constructor Details

    • MediumAi

      public MediumAi()
      Constructor for MediumAi. Initializes the list of available moves and potential hits based on the size of the game board.

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      public Point makeMove(Board board)
      Chooses the next move for the AI player. It prioritizes moves around the last successful hit, if available, otherwise makes a random choice.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in interface AiStrategy
      Parameters:
      board - The current state of the game board (not used in this strategy).
      Returns:
      The Point object representing the coordinates of the chosen move.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no moves are available.

    • addPotentialHits

      public void addPotentialHits(Point initialHit)
      Adds potential hit points around a given hit point, considering only orthogonal directions.
      Parameters:
      initialHit - The point where the last hit occurred.

    • testCell

      public void testCell(Point cell)
      Tests a cell for the presence of a ship and updates the state accordingly.
      Parameters:
      cell - The Point object representing the coordinates of the cell to test.

    • isShipSunk

      public void isShipSunk()
      Checks if the last hit ship is sunk and updates the state of the AI.
